document_data.name: ''Augmenting whetstone''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''augmenting whetstone''''' was a type of [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[whetstone]] that would temporarily bestow enchantments.
document_data.Powers: This variety of enchanted whetstone generally granted weapons that touched it a temporary ''+2 enchantment'', though more expensive variations offered higher enchantments. With the most expensive ''augmenting whetstone'' giving a ''+6 enchantment''.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]],<ref group="note">The date for all Year 1 RPGA sanctioned adventures is considered to be [[1479 DR]] for the purposes of this wiki. a group of [[adventurer]]s were potentially rewarded one of these by the [[Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen]]'s for clearing [[undead]] from the guild's tomb within the [[City of the Dead]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Woolmen's Restless Tomb|28}}
